function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Ensure accessible, reliable, and up-to-date information sources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures and verify information sources","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continued monitoring of air pollution levels and implementation of strict regulations to control industrial pollution post-lockdown.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Forecasting and planning for the post-lockdown power demand, implementation of demand-side management strategies, and reinforcement of the power grid infrastructure.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strict social distancing measures, provide personal protective equipment ppe to workers, and conduct regular testing and health screenings","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversify supply chain, implement alternative shipping methods, prioritize essential product shipments","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Streamlining decision-making processes, increasing coordination between government bodies","category":"Facilitate transparent demande","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation of ai and ml models, continuous monitoring and feedback","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Include diverse parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thoughtful selection of tree species to minimize pollen concentrations","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing measures to
